books.title: Genesis
books.description: In the beginning, God created the Heavens and the Earth. ... and the Spirit of God was hovering over the waters.

books.title: Exodus
books.description: Honor your father and your mother, so that you may live long in the land the Lord your God is giving you.

books.title: Leviticus
books.description: Don't seek revenge | bear a grudge against anyone among your people, love your neighbor as yourself. I am the Lord.

books.title: Numbers
books.description: The Lord is slow to anger, abounding in love and forgiving sin and rebellion. Yet he does not leave the guilty unpunished

books.title: Deuteronomy
books.description: Hear, O Israel, The Lord our God, the Lord is one. Love the Lord your God with all your heart & soul & all your strength

books.title: Joshua
books.description: then choose for yourselves this day whom you will serve ... as for me and my household, we will serve the Lord

books.title: Judges
books.description: And the Angel of the Lord appeared to him and said to him, The Lord is with you, you mighty man of courage

books.title: Ruth
books.description: May you be richly rewarded by the Lord, the God of Israel, under whose wings you have come to take refuge.

books.title: 1 Samuel
books.description: There is no one holy like the Lord; there is no one besides you;there is no Rock like our God.

books.title: 2 Samuel
books.description: Though you are little in your own eyes, aren't you the head of the tribes of Israel? The Lord anointed you king over Israel

books.title: 1 Kings
books.description: So be strong, act like a man, and observe what the Lord your God requires: Walk in obedience to him .

books.title: 2 Kings
books.description: Don't be afraid. Those  with us are more than those who are with them ..., Open his eyes, LORD, so that he may see

books.title: 1 Chronicles
books.description: Tell of all his wonderful acts.Glory in his holy name; let the hearts of those who seek the Lord rejoice.

books.title: 2 Chronicles
books.description: He gave them these orders: “You must serve faithfully and wholeheartedly in the fear of the Lord.

books.title: Ezra
books.description: Despite their fear of the peoples @ them, they built the altar on its foundation & sacrificed burnt offerings on it to the Lord

books.title: Nehemiah
books.description: Hear us, our God, for we are despised. Turn their insults back on their own heads. Give them over ...

books.title: Esther
books.description: If I have found favor with you, Your Majesty, and if it pleases you, grant me my life—this is my petition

books.title: Job
books.description: After Job had prayed for his friends, the Lord restored his fortunes and gave him twice as much as he had before.

books.title: Psalms
books.description: Guide me in your truth and teach me, for you are God my Savior, and my hope is in you all day long

books.title: Proverbs
books.description: A wicked person earns deceptive wages, but the one who sows righteousness reaps a sure reward.

books.title: Ecclesiastes
books.description: He has made everything beautiful in its time. He has also set eternity in the human heart

books.title: Song of Solomon
books.description: Awake, north wind, and come, south wind! Blow on my garden, that its fragrance may spread everywhere

books.title: Isaiah
books.description: The ransomed of the Lord will return. They will enter Zion with singing; everlasting joy will crown their heads.

books.title: Jeremiah
books.description: Call to me and I will answer you and tell you great and unsearchable things you do not know.

books.title: Lamentations
books.description: For no one is cast off by the Lord forever. Though he brings grief, he will show compassion, so great is his unfailing love.

books.title: Ezekiel
books.description: Then you, my people, will know that I am the Lord, when I open your graves and bring you up from them.

books.title: Daniel
books.description: We do not make requests of you because we are righteous, but because of your great mercy.

books.title: Hosea
books.description: I will heal their waywardness and love them freely, for my anger has turned away from them.

books.title: Joel
books.description: Be glad, people of Zion, rejoice in the Lord your God, for he has given you the autumn rains because he is faithful

books.title: Amos
books.description: I will send a famine through the land— not a famine of food or a thirst for water, but a famine of hearing the words of the Lord.

books.title: Obadiah
books.description: Though you soar like the eagle and make your nest among the stars, from there I will bring you down

books.title: Jonah
books.description: But I, with shouts of grateful praise, will sacrifice to you. What I have vowed I will make good

books.title: Micah
books.description: Who is a God like you, who pardons sin and forgives the transgression of the remnant of his inheritance?

books.title: Nahum
books.description: The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him

books.title: Habakkuk
books.description: though there are no sheep in the pen and no cattle in the stalls, yet I will rejoice in the Lord, I will be joyful in God my Savior.

books.title: Zephaniah
books.description: The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves. He will take great delight in you

books.title: Haggai
books.description: The glory of this present house will be greater than the glory of the former house,’ says the Lord Almighty

books.title: Zechariah
books.description: This is what the Lord Almighty says: ‘Administer true justice; show mercy and compassion to one another

books.title: Malachi
books.description: But for you who revere my name, the sun of righteousness will rise with healing in its rays

books.title: Matthew
books.description: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

books.title: Mark
books.description: For even the Son of Man did not come to be served, but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

books.title: Luke
books.description: For the Son of Man came to seek and to save the lost ... Do to others as you would have them do to you.

books.title: John
books.description: I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

books.title: Acts
books.description: Repent, then, and turn to God, so that your sins may be wiped out, that times of refreshing may come from the Lord.

books.title: Romans
books.description: For I am not ashamed of the gospel, because it is the power of God that brings salvation to everyone who believes
